markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stone Fist Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3312)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=657" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 288 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 247 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 13 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your fists become hard as stone. For 1 hour, your fists deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage and lose the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661) trait.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Stone Fist Elixir
